bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Illness Sign Combined Designation of headache affecting only one half of the head, and of headache reaching from the eyes, the eybrows and the forehead to the top of the head. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 12: 偏正頭痛 , 眉骨痛 , 肢體倦怠 , “ Hemilateral and ordinary headache , pain in the eyebrow bones, and fatigue of the limbs and body”.

② Pathological Condition Combined Designation of pathological conditions with either hemilateral or ordinary headache as their major signs. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 15: 療偏正頭痛 , 解身體拘倦 , 清爽神志 , 通利 關竅 , 大川芎丸方 , “For healing hemilateral and ordinary headache , to resolve cramps affecting the body, to clear the mind, and to make passes and orifices passable, [use] the recipe for major pills with chuan xiong ”.
